name: Byte Knytes
description:
----Intro----

Byte Knytes is a local multiplayer 2D capture the flag platformer in which you can battle against a friend. There is no single player so if you have no friends we wouldn't recommend this game. Byte Knytes is a simple game that can help kill some time with a friend. This game is in early development and will be updated.

---The Controls---

--Universal--

Escape = Pause Game

W/S and ArrowUp/ArrowDown = Cycle through menu options

Enter/Space = Select

F11 = Fullscreen

F4 = Experimental Splitscreen

-Gamepad-

DPAD Left = Left

DPAD Right = Right

DPAD Up/Down = Cycle through menu options

A/X = Jump

Hold A/X = Higher jump

Y/Triangle=Taunt

Start = Pause

--Keyboard--

-Player 1-

W = Jump

Hold W = Higher jump

A = Left

D = Right

S = Taunt

-Player2-

Arrow Up=Jump

Hold Arrow Up = Higher jump

Arrow Left=Left

Arrow Right=Right

Arrow Down=Taunt

---Credit---

All music is released for free by Visager.
